Class ScheduleDAO

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.ScheduleDAO
public class ScheduleDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the "schedules" table in the database. Provides methods for CRUD operations related to movie schedules.

    • ScheduleDAO

      public ScheduleDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getAllSchedules

      public List<Schedule> getAllSchedules()
      Retrieves all schedules from the "schedules" table.
      Returns:
      A list of all schedules in the database.

    • getSchedulesByMonth

      public List<Schedule> getSchedulesByMonth(LocalDate monthDate)
      Retrieves schedules for a given month and year.
      Parameters:
      monthDate - The month and year to filter schedules by.
      Returns:
      A list of schedules that occur in the specified month.

    • createSchedule

      public boolean createSchedule(Schedule schedule)
      Creates a new schedule in the database.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The schedule object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      True if the schedule was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • getAvailableSeatsCount

      public int getAvailableSeatsCount(int scheduleId)
      Retrieves the count of available seats for a specific schedule.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - The ID of the schedule.
      Returns:
      The number of available seats for the given schedule.

    • deleteSchedule

      public boolean deleteSchedule(int scheduleId)
      Deletes a schedule from the database. A schedule can only be deleted if no tickets have been sold for it.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - The ID of the schedule to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the schedule was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • isScheduleExists

      public boolean isScheduleExists(int hallId, LocalDate sessionDate, LocalTime sessionTime)
      Checks if a schedule already exists for a given hall, session date, and time.
      Parameters:
      hallId - The ID of the hall.
      sessionDate - The session date.
      sessionTime - The session time.
      Returns:
      True if the schedule exists, false otherwise.

    • getSchedulesBetweenDates

      public List<Schedule> getSchedulesBetweenDates(int movieId, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves schedules for a specific movie between two dates.
      Parameters:
      movieId - The ID of the movie.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      A list of schedules for the specified movie within the given date range.

    • extractScheduleFromResultSet

      private Schedule extractScheduleFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Extracts a schedule object from the current row of a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ResultSet object containing the schedule data.
      Returns:
      A Schedule object populated with the data from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the ResultSet.
